entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
